ygData.subject: Drunken Clerics
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure if anyone else has seen this bug but I thought I d ask just to see if it s a clientside bug I ve picked up or not. If I have an alcoholic drink in
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure if anyone else has seen this bug but I thought I'd ask just to
see if it's a clientside bug I've picked up or not.

If I have an alcoholic drink in slot 3 of my inventory and I right click
on my third spell to forget it I seem to drink one bottle of whatever I
have in that 3rd inventory slot. I didn't notice I was doing this the
first time and I was messing about with my spells memming and remmemming
spells to cure someone.. I stood up and everything was swaying all over
the place.. it seems I'd drunk about 3 bottles of alcohol while I was
memmin/forgetting spells.. this almost got my entire party killed since
I couldn't cast when I needed to.

Anyone else experienced this?

Vinamin
Son of Innoruuk
Priest of The Lady
Erollisi Marr
